I shall not deprive you of your reward, my friend. Here it is.
I do not take kindly to people reneging on deals. People who have crossed me in the past would warn you to choose your next words carefully. At least, they would warn you if any were still alive.
Pitiful. You are such an idiot you do not even understand I could have you killed with but a word. You are truly a sad and pathetic creature.
My patience is at an end. Let's see if you can back up your bravado and stop me from taking what's mine!
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> You dare threaten my daughter? I should cut you down where you stand... but I cannot take the risk. Very well, I give in to your demands.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> An empty threat! My daughter is safe from the likes of you as I always look after the ones I love. Your bluff has been called. I suggest you give me the gem... now.
Here, then... 700 gold pieces and the item. Though you are robbing me, that is all I have.
You will find me as unyielding as a stone wall. I have made my offer, you will not find a better. I suggest you take it.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Very well, I understand your point well enough. I was a smuggler once, after all. I will throw in a further 300 gold pieces.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Save your breath for you will find me as unyielding as a stone wall. I have made my offer, you will not find a better. I suggest you take it.
You have done as I asked and delivered the gems to me, though your attitude at the last was unwelcome. Most unwelcome and very unpleasant.
Such attitudes are the reason I wish to take my daughter from these lands. In Evermeet, she will not have to worry about people of your ilk destroying her innocence.
Farewell, then. I doubt we shall meet again.
I cannot thank you enough for delivering the gems to me. Now I can at last take my daughter to Evermeet, as I promised. I cannot wait to show her Corellon's Grove.
Farewell to you, friend. Perhaps we shall meet again someday.
I must be on my way, now.

Here... I have acquired a key that I was told will open Wanev's cottage here in Port Llast. It's near the eastern gate and may have some information that will allow access to the tower. Wanev has not been in the cottage for some time but still, I bid you caution.
Ah, yes. A smuggler and ruthless adventurer out of Waterdeep? Perhaps you've heard of my little encounter with the Knights of the Shield?
It is of no matter. You heard tales only of the man I once was. I am no longer he, even if you choose not to believe me.
It is true, I was once an agent for the black market. However, I have long since retired from that profession.

But you have to understand, there's retired and then there's 'retired.' Truth is, I may have a few items left over from my heyday that I'm still looking to unload. Nothing much, but maybe you'd like to take a look.
Excellent - I'm sure you'll find my goods of top quality and bottom price.
Was that an insult? I'm not even sure, so I'll let it pass. However, to answer your question, I am retired.
It's true I used to keep a few spare items on me to sell for old time's sake. But those days are long gone. Is there anything else I can do for you?
I assure you, my thick-skulled friend, I am well and truly retired.
Something else you wished to ask, then?
This house has a musky, unpleasant odor, though the source is not apparent.
You must be one of Lady Aribeth's stalwart heroes! I hope you find that cult!
Excuse me, <sir/madam>. I haven't the time to speak right now.
Move along, <boy/girl>. Ain't got time for you.
A bit underdressed for the weather, don't you think?
Ah! My eyes! Please be decent enough to dress yourself!
'Tis nice undercothes you've got there.
You seem more than a bit bloodied, <mister/missus>.
You are heavily wounded, <mister/missus>! Get ye to a temple!
Ouch! You look like a dressed animal with all of those wounds!
Dropped on yer head as a child? I've known folks like that.
'Tis a slow day and I've a slow <man/woman> to spend it with.
Must be a hard life to be so stupi... uh, nevermind.
Put your weapon away, <master/mistress>! I mean you no harm!
Please don't wave your weapon about. It makes me nervous!
Do you have to keep your weapon drawn?
Hello, holy one!
Fresh from a temple be ye?
Must be nice to be one of those who are blessed by the gods.
I don't like to mix with you wizard types.
Just keep walking, wizard. I don't wanna get turned into a toad!
Can't ye wizards leave us normal folks alone?
You be a mighty fine woman! Do you like peasants?
You be a right pretty lass!
Wish my wife looked more like you. (sigh) Don't tell her I said that.
What a fine hunk of man I've got here!
I wish my husband looked more like you!
Hello, handsome!
Nice to see good people like yourself in Port Llast.
You seem to be a true hero, <sir/madam>!
How are you, <mister/missus>?
Been a good year on the farm! Hope the weather holds.
I don't want any trouble. Just leave me alone.
It's people like you who give adventuring a bad name.
I work on a farm and I never expected to see someone who is dirtier than me!
Quite the smell you've got there, barbarian. Moose droppings?
Keep away from my children, barbarian!
You be one of those <race> critters that I've heard about?
How do you do, <race> one?
Good day to you, <race> one.
North to Green Griffon Inn
East to Neverwinter Wood
South to Charwood
Mmmm, you looks good. You should date Flarg.
Who's that? Is you my brother? Uh, guess not.
Urrgh. Me back hurts much.
Flarg do this. Flarg do that. Why Flarg do all work?
Flarg's pay sucks. Want more copper.
Whip Flarg? Someday Flarg whip them all.
You no call Flarg stupid!
Lift and pull. Pull and lift. Flarg gettin' tired!
Flarg gots blisters on his blisters! Me need vacation!
Flarg no understand why me got lousy job.
What do you charge for a room?
What pay for room?
May I ask you some questions?
Me questions ask you?
Goodbye.
That'll do.
You no make fun or arms get ripped off!
Save stupid jokes and tell what me pay.
Has there been anything odd going on around here?
Do you know where I might find some work in town?
Perhaps you could give me some directions?
Where me get job?
Bad stuff happen 'round here?
Nevermind.
What do you know about the plague?
But the plague is over, why dwell on the past?
Werewolves? Where did you hear about werewolves?
Well, that doesn't interest me. Can I ask you some other questions?
Nature? What do you mean?
What a wonderful little theory. Why don't we get back to something a little more interesting?
Well, I suppose I will go talk to Ander then. Goodbye.
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Is there anyone else I should talk to about the werewolves?
Maybe I should talk to him, but first could you answer another question?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> What? You can tell me. I won't repeat anything, I swear.
I guess I'll go talk to them.
I suspect you are overly paranoid. I'd better talk to Alhelor now.
That's interesting. Maybe I could ask you a few more questions?
Whatever. Maybe you could answer a few more questions though?
Where can I find some supplies?
This place is called Port Llast. I assume that means there are docks around here somewhere.
What do you mean by that?
All right. I have a few more questions for you.
Goodbye.
I don't suppose so. Could you answer another question?
Okay, maybe you could answer another question?
Okay. Goodbye.
All right, I will do that. Goodbye.
Okay, but first I would like to ask you another question.
I will do that. Goodbye.
I might, but first I have another question.
That sounds good. See you later.
Maybe, but first another question.
Where werewolf?
Crazy trees?
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Who else knows werewolf?
Okay, me go talk Ander now.
Me want more questions.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> What me no nevermind?
Me be okay. Me be tough customer. Bye.
Me no worry. Me have more questions.
Me done here. Bye.
Me want more questions.
Ballard. A duck?
Okay, but first you answer more questions.
Okay, me go find Ballard.
Oh, okay. Now you answer another question.
You help me find places?
That's all I need thank you.
Could you answer another question?
Where me get good stuff?
Why this place called Port Llast? You have docks here?
Okay, me go.
Now you answer more questions.
Why not be safe?
Me have more questions.
Me not scared of werewolf! Now answer new question.
Good day to you. Always a pleasure to see a fellow <Race> here at the Alliance Arms Inn. How can I be of service to you my friend?
Oh grand, another barbarian. I guess I can allow you to stay, but do try to be careful with the furniture. You do know what furniture is... oh forget it. How can I help you?
Servants of the gods are awarded special treatment here at the Alliance Arms Inn. How may I be of service to you, <Master/Mistress>?
Welcome! The Alliance Arms Inn is fortunate indeed to be visited by such heroic folk as yourself <lord/lady>. How may a humble innkeep be of service to you?
Welcome to the Alliance Arms Inn. It is a pleasure to serve a hero at my humble establishment. Is there anything I can get for you, <sir/madam>?
What do you want? Even if you are a hero I still expect you to conduct yourself properly if you want to stay here. I have a reputation to uphold.
Only 5 gold pieces for a quality room. I assure you, it will be a peaceful sleep after a hard day.
Well, you certainly look much more relaxed. Ready to get back to another day of adventuring I'm sure. Is there anything else I can do for you?
My, my, we do have a delightful way of speaking, don't we? I do hope you know how to use the chamber pot. I hate having to change soiled sheets.
Ah... yes, so sorry <sir/madam>.
Your pardon.
(sigh) Just don't waste too much of my time. I am very busy, <sir/madam>.
I'll do my best <sir/madam>.
There has been trouble throughout the north this past while. Between plagues and werewolves a man can hardly step foot outside his inn.
It's over, of course, but I don't know that the effects have entirely passed. Looters and bandits are always a problem, but nature also seems to feel the repercussions of something that severe.
I've been hearing about strange things from Neverwinter Wood. Of course that might just be completely unrelated.
It's just that there is this ranger, Ballard, who was talking about it here the other day. He seemed to be quite disturbed.
If you want to know more I would ask Ballard. He's camped in a grove of trees to the north east of the inn.
Hmm, as you wish.
It may be over, but there are some who suggest that the effects might be more wide-spread than just making people sick.
Nature itself is still feeling the effects.
It's all they're talking about in here. Some knight came along and convinced some boys to go hunting werewolves, but then it turned out...
Actually it would probably be better to get the information first-hand. Ander is a survivor of the whole thing. He's in here this <quarterday> and he can tell the tale better than I can.
Well, there is Alhelor. He seems to know a lot about werewolves. He also has some special equipment to sell to werewolf hunters. You could talk to him, I suppose. Although... no, nevermind.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Well, I hate to say anything, but there is something a little odd about Alhelor. He just puts me on edge. I doubt it is anything serious. Just my nerves I suspect.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> No. I refuse to gossip about a customer. Talk to him and see for yourself.
Certainly <sir/madam>. What would you like to know about?
If you really need to know, I suppose.
For normal supplies I would suggest the Cracked Anvil to the southeast.
Yes <sir/madam>. The docks are located just west of here. They are fairly safe, at least as safe as things can be in these times.
One can never feel truly safe when there are werewolves running around.
Some work for an adventurous soul? Well there is that elf over there. He calls himself "The Serpent" and has been inquiring about adventurers for a couple of days.
I'm not sure what he wants, but it might be worth your while to check it out. He certainly seems to have no lack of gold.
Haven't had enough yet? You should speak to Mayor Kendrack. He usually has a worry or two that need taking care of.
Sorry, I haven't heard of anything lately.
I wonder what kind of job you might be able to handle without bungling? Oh well, let me see.
Bad stuff. Well, there is the stew we served last night, but I don't suppose that's exactly what you meant.
We've been plagued by werewolves near town and I hear that the Neverwinter Wood has things that are even worse.
I'm not sure where it is now, but you could talk to Ander. He was there when it all happened. He's here in the tavern this <quarterday>.
You could talk to Alhelor, he has stuff to kill werewolves. Just be... no, nevermind.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Well, it's silly, but he is a little odd. It's probably nothing.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> No, I shouldn't have said anything. Do you need anything else?
I doubt that I could explain it to you. Perhaps you should go talk to Ballard. He is camped out in the grove of trees to the northeast.
That would be a mallard. Ballard is a ranger.
Ugh, I shiver to think of the difficulty that you will have when trying to think up questions.
I suppose if I use very small words, you might be able to follow my directions.
If you are looking for magical supplies you could try looking up Eltoora in the northeast part of town.
Feel free to spend lots of money here at the Alliance Arms Inn, where paying customers are always welcome.
I'll bet a cup of wine would help you come up with more questions. Give it some thought.
When you're done, come back and have a nice spiced cider, to help you relax after a stressful day.
Don't forget to try our special selection of ales before you leave town.
With a head like a rock, no doubt. Well, good luck and don't run up any large tabs.
Don't forget, the Alliance Arms Inn has one of the best selections of imported ale this side of Waterdeep.
Remember, you can get a good rest here at the Alliance Arms Inn. Camping causes cramping!
Well, that'll teach me to open my mouth, now won't it.
Oh, in the name of Umberlee, put some clothes on <man/woman>!
Now that's the kinda thing that makes a man pay attention to a pretty thing like you.
You look like you've been digested by a dragon and came out the other end! Find a healer <boy/girl>.
Did you get caught between the dock and a ship? You're bleeding all over the place.
Hey <lad/lass>, are ya lost or something?
Oh how I wish I was out on the briney blue ocean again.
I hate being in port. The smell of townsfolk makes me sick.
Nothing like the smell of fish guts and the gentle slap of waves against the dock to make one feel at home.
I would love to chat, but I don't have the time to explain everything to ya.
Might be a bit of a storm rollin' in off the ocean tonight.
I miss the roll and pitch of the gentle waves. Back to sea for me.
Hope I can get a pint or two of ale while I'm in port.
How do you know my name?
How you know me name?
Hunt down who?
Who you hunt down?
I can't talk right now.
Me no talk right now.
Who are we searching for?
Who we search?
I'll do my best.
Me try hard.
I have no interest in finding this cult.
Me not care 'bout no cult.
None of your business, soldier. Goodbye.
You mind you own business, guy!
You're right. We should track them down. I'll do my best.
You right. Me try get cult. Me try hard.
Hello, <FullName>, Hero of Neverwinter! I am Barax, formerly a soldier of Neverwinter, now I intend to hunt down the bastards who did this to us!
Everyone in Neverwinter knows your name. You were one of the people who saved us from the plague and I suspect that you'll help just as much in the search for the bastards who started it.
The cult of course! This mysterious organization that unleashed the plague on Neverwinter and killed so many innocent people. A hero like you is just what we need to find them.
Don't let me keep you busy. I'm sure that you'll want to talk to Aribeth. We have to report all of our findings to her, after all. Best of luck with the search!
I'm sure that it will be more than enough. A lot of innocent people were killed and this cult owes us a debt that can only be repaid in blood. Give 'em hell for all of us, <FirstName>!
What!? These bastards unleashed a plague upon our city that killed countless innocent people! We have a chance to find them and you say you don't care?!
I have nothing else to say to you. I thought that you were a hero.
Greetings, <FullName>. I hope you find the cult soon. They must be punished!
Excuse me, <man/woman>. I don't wish to speak with someone who is so uncaring about the innocents who suffered through the plague.
I heard that you tracked down the cult in Luskan. Give 'em hell for all of us, <FullName>!
Many innocent people died because of the plague. The cult must pay!
I hope that you find this cult and kill them all!
At last, a true hero to help us punish these cultists! They'll wish they never met you, <FullName>!
I had friends who died to the Wailing and I intend to kill any cultists I find... slowly.
The cultists will rue the day they messed with Neverwinter!
After so much pain and suffering in Neverwinter, I am consumed with thoughts of revenge. The cult will be destroyed!
It's a pleasure to meet you.
Me think nice to meet you.
On your way, girl. I haven't the time to waste on the likes of you.
You no bother me, girly. You not important.
Excuse me, I must be going.
Me gotta go.
Ah, <FullName>, you have awoken at last! I feel privileged to finally meet you! The Hero of Neverwinter, here before me!
I'm getting ahead of myself. You must excuse me, I'm just so excited to meet you!
Welcome to Port Llast! I trust you had a safe journey from Neverwinter. My name is Larana and Lady Aribeth has given me the honor of greeting you upon your arrival.
Let me say again how much I look up to you! We've all heard of the heroic deeds you performed in Neverwinter and how you saved so many lives from that terrible plague.
Oh, I am sorry, <sir/madam>. I certainly don't want to waste the time of someone who has great deeds to perform. It is just such a pleasure to meet you.
I wish not to be a bother, <sir/madam>. I realize that you have important things to do. It's just such a pleasure to meet you!
I know that you must be anxious to speak with Lady Aribeth and begin the search for the cult. She is anxious to speak with you too!
You can find Lady Aribeth and her associate, Aarin Gend, in the next room, near the exit of this building. Please go and see her right away.
Greetings, Hero of Neverwinter! Please pause for a moment and speak with me.
Hello, again <FirstName>! If you have not yet spoken to Aribeth, you should.
This area smells strongly of wolf but has signs of human activity. Whatever lives here is not currently at home.
You must be one of the adventurers from Neverwinter! Welcome to Port Llast!
How are you today, <mister/missus>?
Move along. I don't have time to mix with your type.
Citizen! Put some clothes on!
Listen, <mister/missus>, I would appreciate it if you'd dress like decent folk while in Port Llast.
I don't know how things are where you come from, but here in Port Llast, we don't dress like courtesans. Put some decent clothes on!
Been through a war there, friend? I suggest you head to the temple and get some healing.
Gods, <man/woman>, you're bleeding like a stuck pig!
I've not seen wounds like that on anyone who was still walking. You'd best get some healing while you still can.
Hmm, idiots parade today? Must have missed the notice.
Jaw looks a bit slack, friend. Need a drool cloth?
Don't think too hard. Your brain's liable to liquefy even further.
Please put your weapons away when within the town limits, <sir/madam>.
Hey! Don't go waving your weapons around in this town! I've got my eye on you!
Keep your weapons sheathed in Port Llast. I don't want to have to jail you.
Ah, a holy <man/woman>. Welcome to Port Llast!
A good <day/night> to you, your grace. Looking for a temple?
Just doing my job. Don't bring the wrath of your god down upon me!
One of them wizardly people, huh? Watch where you put them spells.
If you're looking for magical supplies, there's a wizard enclave up on the hill.
Heh, heh. I bet you have a BIG tower, mage.
Hey honey, you're looking great!
Such a pretty lass! Do you like soldiers?
Aren't you a sight for sore eyes!
I hope you enjoy your time in Port Llast. Would that we had more visitors like you here.
Hello to you, my <lord/lady>! Please enjoy all that Port Llast has to offer!
Hello.
Nice weather we've been having, eh?
Must you stay in Port Llast? Maybe you'd find Luskan more to your liking.
Stand away, citizen!
Greetings, my barbarous friend.
No raging allowed in town, friend.
Ever wash your clothes, barbarian?
Sometimes I feel like the humans are being crowded out with all of you <race> type people wandering in and out.
Move along, <race> scum. I don't like to mix with the likes of you.
Good <quarterday> to you. Don't you have someplace to go other than Port Llast?
It seems that a small underground complex has been built beneath the cottage.
I didn't think it was such a bad place. What's your name anyways?
Well you certainly have this place pegged. What's your name?
Me think you wrong. This place okay. What name you have?
You right, this place suck big. What name you have?
My name is <FirstName>. Could you answer some questions?
My name is <FullName>, but you may call me <FirstName>. It is a pleasure to meet a beautiful, young woman such as yourself.
Me name <FirstName>. You answer me questions?
Me name <FullName>, but you call me <FirstName>. I glad meet you. You pretty!
I would like to ask you some questions.
What is it that you hate about this town so much?
I think you just bring out the best in me.
Me want ask you question.
Me not know why town bad for you.
Me feel like you make me be best I can.
I'm not sure I like where this is going. Why don't you answer some questions for me?
That is very interesting. What else does a woman like you need?
Me not like where this lead. Me want ask question.
Me not sure what you saying. Why you stand so close?
Me listen, you tell more.
Um, I'm going to have to think about that. First I need you to answer some questions.
I don't think so. I can't be worrying about protecting you while in the middle of a fight.
Perhaps we could talk more about this in the morning, when we wake up?
I would love to have you along. Why don't you go get your weapons and armor and meet me out front?
Me not sure. You answer questions first.
Me not want you 'round. You get in way. Bye.
Maybe we go bed now, talk in morning.
Me think that great idea. You get weapons and armor and we meet out front.
1000 gold? Are you out of your mind? I'm not giving you that much!
I think 200 gold would probably be enough to get you started.
Okay, 1000 gold sounds reasonable.
1000? Me no give you so much!
That too much. Me give 200 gold, no more.
Okay, me give you 1000 gold.
What are you buying? A golden chariot? Forget that!
Well, I suppose I could give you 2000 gold.
You be nuts! Me no give you so much.
Okay, me guess you get 2000 gold.
I think I've had enough of this. Have a good life.
Me had 'nough. Could buy trained warrior for less.
Well I certainly wouldn't want to bore you. Why don't we go talk about this somewhere more private?
Me want us be alone.
Have you heard anything about a cult working in the area?
Is there anything unusual going on in town?
Do you know where I can find a job?
I need some directions.
Nevermind.
What you know 'bout cult or stuff like that?
What odd stuff in town?
Where me find job?
Me need find stuff.
Um, sure. What is your name?
The power of a woman is unlimited. Never settle for less than what you deserve.
You go girl. What name you got?
You got that right. Me never back down to no one.
That depends on who I'm killing. I prefer <FirstName>.
Young girl, my name is <FullName>. A little less youthful exuberance, please.
You don't need to know my name.
Me called <FirstName>. Me powerful <class>.
Me name be <FullName>, and you need stop bouncing.
Me no tell name.
Then there's your first lesson in adventuring. Life's not fair.
What? Sleep on the ground, in the rain? Or live minutes away from death?
Okay, you are just too young and excitable. I think you should go away now.
What? You want be cold or near death most of time?
You young and foolish. Me no talk anymore.
What exactly is wrong with this town?
I would like you to answer some questions now.
What wrong with town?
Want questions answered now.
There are worse things than boredom kid. Life is pretty hazardous in the outside world.
What can you tell me about the plague in Neverwinter?
Is there anything unusual going on in town?
Are there any jobs available?
I need directions.
Nevermind.
What tell me 'bout Neverwinter plague?
What odd happen in town?
Me need job. You tell.
Me need find stuff.
So why are you talking to me about it?
Be content with your nice safe life and quit your whining.
I'm not having an eager young puppy tripping me up in the middle of combat. You find your own way in life.
Why you tell me?
I'm not sure. Maybe you should answer some questions for me first.
That's not a bad idea. Why don't you go get your weapons and armor and meet me back here in a few minutes.
Me not need 'nother headache. You stay here be safe.
Me not so sure. You answer questions first.
Me like idea. You go get weapons and armor and stuff and come back.
1000 gold? Not on your life!
That is way too much. How about 200 gold and I'll share my food.
Okay. I'll give you the money.
1000 gold? No chance. You be crazy.
Too much. Me give 200 and we share food.
Okay. Me pay money.
Forget it.
2000? Okay.
All right you foolish, greedy child, you can just forget the whole thing.
You be too greedy. Me no want you no more.
You be happy you be alive. Much danger out in world.
Goodbye.
Well hello sir. I don't recognize you. You must be new in these parts.
What is an adventurous fellow like you doing in a crap-town like this?
Why hello my lady! You must be one of the new adventurers in town.
I am so excited to see that a woman of determined personality can get ahead in this world.
You just haven't gotten to know it yet. Once you spend some time here, you'll really hate it.
My name is Shaldrissa. What's yours?
A man of taste and distinction! How wonderful to meet you.
I would be happy to answer any questions you might have. I know pretty much everything that goes on in town, not that there is much to know.
My, a gentleman with manners. That is a rare find in a dump like this.
Are you kidding? This is just a small town, with small-minded people. If I have to stay here I'll end up a grumpy old maid with nothing to enjoy in life.
A young woman with a sharp mind needs adventure... and a powerful man to protect her.
A woman like me needs comforting, desire, wealth and power. I can't believe I am being so open with you.
You make my head spin, I... I feel overwhelmed just being so close to you.
So what do you think? Would you have room for a determined young woman to follow and... assist you?
Oh, I can't do that here. If you take me with you and get me away from this place, then I'm sure we could arrange something.
No? You good for nothing jerk! Get away from me then. I never want to see your face again!
Weapons and armor? I don't have any. Could you lend me 1000 gold so that I could get some?
200 gold? Are you kidding? You want me to dress like an urchin on the street? Get serious. I need 1000 gold to make a good start as an adventurer.
Actually, that probably won't cover all the stuff I'm going to need. Better make that 2000.
Of course that won't cover all of my debts. 3000 ought to do the trick though.
Oh, you dear simple man. I am really so glad I met you.
Really? I guess I was hoping to bring out the worst in you. This town bores me with its niceness.
Mmm. Why don't we get to know each other a little more first?
I told you I never want to see you again. Go away.
A cult? Hah! I wish something so exciting happened in Port Llast. I am SO bored!
In this town? I just told you, nothing ever happens here!
Why would you want a job here in town. I guess if you must know, my father is Mayor Kendrack and I do know about one job offer.
There was a prison break in Waterdeep and my father is offering a huge reward for anyone who can hunt down the escaped criminals.
I only tell you about this because taking the job will help us... I mean you escape the boring clutches of this town.
If you go north, south, or east you can get out of town. If you get on a boat and go west, you can also get out of town. Those are really all the directions you need.
My name is Shaldrissa. What do they call a bold adventuress like you?
Hey! That's not fair. I told you my name.
Oh, I get it. All right, I guess I will try to remember that. You sure are wise. I wish I could live like you do.
All of it! I just want to be away from this boring, dead-end town.
How rude! I don't want you to speak to me ever again!
Oh, I so agree. It is marvelous to meet someone with such a deep understanding of the problems in life.
It is so exciting the way you talk. Not like anyone in this town. They are all just so boring.
Oh, I know I get carried away. It's just that this town is so dull and stifling, it is exciting to meet someone interesting like you.
Are you kidding? This is a dead zone. There is nothing to do here. I can hardly wake up without yawning from boredom.
I would be happy to answer any questions you might have. I know pretty much everything that goes on in town, not that there is much to know.
Neverwinter? That would be somewhere not in town! Plague or not, I think it must be better than here.
In this town? I just told you, nothing ever happens here!
Why would you want a job here in town. I guess if you must know, my father is Mayor Kendrack and I do know about one job offer.
There was a prison break in Waterdeep and my father is offering a huge reward for anyone who can hunt down the escaped criminals.
I only tell you about this because taking the job will help us... I mean you escape the boring clutches of this town.
If you go north, south, or east you can get out of town. If you get on a boat and go west, you can also get out of town. Those are really all the directions you need.
And I am sure you have experienced it all before. Don't you see, that's the opportunity I want.
You could take me with you! You could be my mentor and I your loyal pupil. We could become famous together.
No? You bitch! I'm never talking to you again.
Oh dear. I don't have anything like that. I know, you give me 1000 gold so that I can run and buy some supplies.
You want me to dress like a street urchin? I don't think so. 1000 gold is only fair.
Actually, that won't really be enough. How about 2000?
Of course that won't cover my debts here, so we had better make it 3000.
I must go meet someone.
(sigh) Goodbye, then.
I haven't spared your life! Die, scum!
Why should I not kill you?
You beg, but me still kill you! You die now!
You answer me question, me let you live... maybe.
Don't try to lie to me! Shaldrissa is an innocent girl!
Really. Tell me more.
You may go, but I need your ear to claim the reward. The prison tattoo will be proof that I've killed you.
You run away now but first give me tattoo ear for proof you dead.
I think I've decided to kill you after all.
Me want kill you after all.
Come on now, you don't expect me to believe that load of dung.
Me get mad! You not telling truth!
Fine. I want any money that you have. Right now!
Okay, me want all your money. Right now!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Tell me the truth right now you lying dog!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Tell me truth now, or die!
Okay. I believe you.
Okay. Me believe you.
If you have no money, you're no use to me. Prepare to die!
You have no treasure, then you no use to me.
You're holding out on me! Come clean or I'll slit your throat!
You know more! You tell or me set you on fire!
Shaldrissa? What sort of secrets does she have?
I don't care about any secrets. I want the money!
Shaldrissa? Tell me about Shaldrissa.
Me not care about Shaldrissa. Me want money!
Then what use can you be to me?
Then what you do for me?
Foolish hero! Yesgar will smash you!
Yesgar is glad that you spare his life.
Yesgar not dead yet, puny <race> runt!
Yesgar will tell you secret about young girl Shaldrissa. Then you let Yesgar live?
Wait! Spare Yesgar's life!
You are a kind and merciful <man/woman>! Life is better than ear. Wait... (slice) AH! That smarts.
Yesgar meet Shaldrissa when hiding out at Inn in Port Llast. She smitten with Yesgar's manly physique. She manipulate Yesgar into kidnapping her.
Yesgar tell truth! Shaldrissa want me to run away with her! She to blame, not Yesgar! She want money!
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Okay, don't hurt Yesgar! Me get Shaldrissa drunk. She so drunk she agree to all Yesgar's wants. Heh. She quite a feisty girl.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Me tell truth! Now let Yesgar go!
Yesgar doesn't have any money to give. Yesgar is an outlaw.
Don't kill Yesgar! Yesgar was lying. There is a chest behind Yesgar. In it is a key.
The key will open iron door at south of dungeon. That is where Yesgar has treasure. Can Yesgar go now?
Don't kill Yesgar! Yesgar was lying. There is a chest behind Yesgar. In it is a key.
Shaldrissa not so pure-hearted. Yesgar not kidnap her, she run away with Yesgar! Her idea!
Good. Yesgar always tell truth. Can Yesgar go now?
Yesgar bother you no more.
Take the ear, Yesgar won't bother you again.
Could I ask you some questions?
Me want ask questions.
Goodbye.
What's going on around here?
Who's in charge around here?
You tell me what happening here.
Who boss 'round here?
Who are you?
Who you?
Excuse me?
Would you mind making sense for a moment?
What?
You explain better. Me no understand.
You were attacked by trolls?
Tell me about the attack.
You fight trolls?
You tell me 'bout trolls.
Why don't you?
Don't you want to get revenge?
Why you not go?
You no want trolls killed?
So why don't you go back to Waterdeep?
Why you not leave?
Where is this Jax?
Where Jax be?
Are there others around here?
There be others here?
Who is Lenton?
Where is this Jax?
Who be Lenton?
Thanks for your time. Goodbye.
Okay. Bye bye.
Who is this Lenton?
Who be Lenton?
What were you searching for?
What you search for?
Is there anyone else I can talk to?
Anyone else me talk to?
Why is he upset?
Why he upset?
Is there anyone else?
There be anyone else?
Is there anybody, besides Lenton and Jax, to talk to around here?
There be some to talk to, other than Lenton and Jax?
Greetings my <lord/lady>. I was just getting packed up in the hopes of leaving soon. How may I assist you?
Hello. I was just packing up in the hopes of leaving soon. What can I do for you?
What do you want? I was just packing up in the hopes of leaving soon, so don't waste my time.
Farewell. I hope we can all leave here soon.
All right. Farewell.
Don't bother me anymore.
I will do my best to be helpful.
I guess. What do you want to know?
Well, we were on an archeological expedition with Jax, but since the trolls attacked we have mostly cowered around here.
I guess you could say Jax is. But then again he isn't.
Sorry, I just mean that ever since we were attacked by the trolls, nobody really listens to anybody.
I am an archeologist, working with Jax. At least I was until the expedition was halted by the trolls.
We were exploring the cave systems in this region, when a large group of trolls jumped us. Several of my closest friends died in those caves. I just want to go back to Waterdeep.
Of course I do, but I'm realistic. I can't afford to pay some hero to go slaughter those beasts. I just want to get out of here before the trolls decide to come out of the caves.
No, if you want to hear about revenge, I suggest you go talk to Lenton. He's around here somewhere.
I can't afford the trip by myself and Jax won't leave. He's still hoping for reinforcements from Waterdeep to show up, or for an adventurer to hire.
Lenton should be around here somewhere. You could try talking to him.

Lenton is a very angry archeologist. People always expect archeologists to be timid, little old men and women. But not Lenton. I guess he has a good reason for wanting revenge on the trolls. You'll have to ask him about it though.
Take care. I sure hope we get to leave soon.
Revat is a guard. Not too bright. He's really upset, but then, everybody is upset. You could talk to him, maybe you could help him even.
He's right around here. Look for a forgetful old guy and you've found him.
We were searching for evidence of an ancient race. But you should really talk to Jax about that.
I would really rather you talked to him about that. He should be somewhere right around here.
Not really. Everybody else was either killed by the trolls, or ran away.
You're Revat's Momma right? I am here to rescue you.
You can stop worrying. I'm here to rescue you.
You are free to go, but not with me. You can leave on your own.
Just stay right there and don't move. I'll be back.
You Revat's Momma? Me here save you.
You be happy. Me free you.
You be free, but no follow me.
You don't move. I'll be back.
Sorry, he never said your name.
Since I am here to rescue you, you might want to be more polite.
Him never tell me you name.
You be nice, since me free you.
So how am I supposed to help you?
What do you expect me to do about it?
So what me do to help?
What you think me can do to fix you mistake?
Are you always this miserable?
So why didn't they kill you, or eat you?
Why they not kill and eat you?
You always so grumpy?
The others were attacked by the trolls and ogres, right?
So what did you do?
Them attacked by trolls 'n' ogres?
What you do then?
Could you explain what happened to you again?
You can come with me now.
You're just not worth rescuing. Goodbye.
How you get here again?
Me go now, you follow.
Me not want to rescue you. Bye.
I am clearing the trolls and ogres out of these caves. Who are you and why are you here?
Me kill bad trolls 'n' ugly ogres. Who you and why you here?
So what happened?
Is this story going to take much longer?
That bad. What next?
You get to point soon.
A goddess? Why do you think that?
Somebody's going senile, I think.
Why them think you goddess?
You go crazy, maybe?
Where would I find your son?
I'm busy now, but maybe later.
Where me find you son?
Me busy. Maybe me do later.
Okay. Where would I find your son.
Sorry. Maybe someone else will come along.
Okay. Where me find son?
Me gotta go. Bye.
How will it do that?
All right, here's the ring.
I've changed my mind. I think I'll keep the ring.
How it do that?
Okay, here be you ring.
Me not want give you ring. Me keep.
No. I will keep it and you will die. Goodbye.
Nope. Me keep. Bye.
What do you mean 'kind of' a prisoner?
Well, the trolls guarding you are dead, so you can go.
What you mean by that?
Them trolls be dead. You free now.
Eh... you look like a pretty <boy/girl>. What are you doing here?
Eh... you don't look much like one of those ugly trolls. What are you doing here?
Eh... You might not be green, but you sure look a fair bit like those ugly trolls. What do you want?
It's about time you ended that spell. Er... sorry. Old habit.
Well, thank you again for the assistance, even if it was a bit slow. Try to stay safe.
You be good. Come visit us in Waterdeep and I'll bake you some cookies.
My name is Janis. Hope you can learn that better than my boy.
Not too bright are you? I just hope you have more manners than those slobbering trolls.
You haven't saved me yet. I'll thank you when you have.

So now I get to the worst part. Even though you have killed all of the trolls and ogres, I can't get free. I don't know how long the spell will last, but I'm going to die if I don't get out of here soon.
I need you to go find my son.

I need you to find Revat. He has a ring that was his father's. The ring has a one-time cancellation spell on it. I created it to protect Revat from spellcasters who might seek to harm me by harming my child.
Are you telling me what to do? You're just lucky I didn't plan on going anywhere else for the day. Don't be too long though.
I'm afraid it's not that easy.
I see that you have the ring from Revat. If you would just touch me with the ring, it should negate the spell.
You're back, huh? You certainly took your sweet time. Well?
Only when I've gone without food or water for a couple of days.
Why don't I just tell you the whole story? It's easier to explain that way. You see, I am a mage of no small accomplishment, but I also am fascinated by archeology.

I was with a troop of archeologists and we were exploring these caves. I became interested in an unusual pattern on the cave walls and accidentally became separated from the others. Then I heard the screams.
Don't interrupt. No respect for your elders, that's the problem with your generation.
Figured that out all by yourself, eh?

Then the largest troll I have ever seen came back into the cave. He seemed surprised to see me, which was all that saved me. He started to hoot and shout to the others, then came bounding across the floor.
Oh sure. Leave an old woman to die of thirst and starvation. My painful death is on you!
I began to cast a spell, but the sight of the blood on his claws caused me to slip in the incantation. I had meant to encase him in Otiluke's Resilient Sphere, a very rare, but useful spell.
Have a little patience. I'm almost done.

The spell sucked back on me and trapped me in a form-fitting, impenetrable force field. I couldn't move, but the trolls couldn't hurt me either. They were so impressed, I think they thought I was a goddess.
Watch your tongue young <man/woman>. There is no excuse for being disrespectful to your elders.

There is enough room in this 'shell' for me to talk. When I could talk, but they couldn't hurt me, they started bowing down and bringing me gifts. Not that I could accept them, but they brought them anyway.
We had some outbuildings on the surface near here. He would have stayed there worrying about me. You had better go quickly; the thirst is starting to get to me.
I will surely be dead later. Please, I know I was short-tempered with you, but don't let me die. I beg you.
My death is on your soul. You have doomed me.
Oh, thank you. That feels better. Well? What are you standing around, wasting time for? Don't you have other things you should be doing?
The ring has a one-time cancellation spell on it. I created it to protect Revat from spellcasters who might seek to harm me by harming my child.
Oh, please don't do that! I will die without it. I beg you.
My name is Janis and I was a prisoner of those monsters. Well, kind of a prisoner.
Actually, it's not quite that easy.
Don't strain yourself trying to think it through.

By the time I got back to where they were, everyone had either been killed, or had fled. I was very concerned for my son Revat. He is a little slow of mind. In a quick glimpse I noticed that his body wasn't on the ground.
You seem rather nervous. What's your name?
I don't look like who?
Who you be?
Me not look like who?
I am <FirstName>. What creatures are you talking about?
My name is <FullName> and I am interested in hearing more about these creatures.
Nevermind my name, what are these creatures you are looking for?
Me be <FirstName>. What creatures you hunt?
Me name be <FullName> and me want know more about creatures.
You not need know name. You tell me about creatures.
Maybe we should start with introductions.
Trolls? Tell me more!
Trolls. You tell me 'bout trolls.
So you are looking for dead things?
You mean you want find dead thing?
Trolls? Ogres? Tell me more about them.
Tell me more about this creator race.
What kind of treasure are you suggesting?
I think I've heard enough. Goodbye.
Me want know about trolls.
What more you know about creator race?
Treasure? Me want hear more 'bout treasure.
Me grow bored. Bye bye.
What you need for to prove?
I could help you look for this ancient tome.
I'm not really interested.
I help you get tome.
Me not care for books. Me find other things to do.
What were you looking for again?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I want to help you find that book. How much will you pay me?
This wouldn't happen to be the book you are looking for, would it?
You say what you looking for again?
Me want look for book. How much you pay?
Maybe this be book you want?
Goodbye.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You wouldn't believe the hell I had to go through to get this. Surely you could afford a little more.
You better fork over more than that or you'll get to experience all the pain I suffered recovering the darn thing.
Certainly, that sounds fine by me.
Not a chance. Finders keepers you know.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me work hard to find. Me want more.
Me show you how much it hurt to find 'less you give me more!
That seem fair.
No selling! Me keeping book. Finders keepers.
All right. 750 gold pieces it is.
Okay. 750 gp.
I don't think so. I can get a better price from someone else, I think.
Nope, me sell for more to someone else.
That sounds better. Hand over the gold.
Nope, I'm keeping it.
That be better. Here you book.
Nope, me keep.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> All right. I hate to part with it for only 500 gp, though...
I guess I need the 500 gold more than the book.
That's all right. I can find someone else who will pay me for it, I think.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Mmmm... okay. But me likes it a lot... 500 gold pieces seems not so much.
Me guesses 500 gold pieces is okay.
Nope. Me sell someone else for more.
Where did you say you thought that book was?
I think I found your book, is this it?
No, nothing yet.
Quit being so pushy! I'll get around to finding it.
Found it, me thinks. This it?
Nope. But me working on it.
You no bug me. Me find when good and ready to find.
Where me find book again?
Okay, goodbye.
What did you do then?
Obviously you didn't hire good guards!
I'm sorry for your grief.
Get to the point.
Me sorry they die.
Hurry up.
What you do?
Why you no hire big, strong guards?
When did they fight dragons?
How long ago did this supposedly take place?
When fight dragons?
When this maybe happen?
And you think you can prove this race existed?
Grant money? Is that what you are worried about?
What is the grant money for?
What grant money?
Ah! You care 'bout money. That me understand.
That would be just fine.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> This sounds very dangerous. I think some money up front would be justified.
That be good.
All right, I'm off.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> This sound dangerous. Me want gold first to do job.
Me off.
Good enough, for now.
Me agree, for now.
What's your name again?
What you called?
What kind of research do you do here?
What re-search? What you do here?
Research? You mean you're hunting creatures?
Uhh... you mean you hunts stuff?
Help! Attack! What? Who? Er... oh... um... you don't look like... nevermind. Hello <sir/madam>.
You are back already? What can I help you with now?
Er... oh, you're already back. What can I do to help you? Any evidence of the tome yet?
Ah, yes... you are with <CUSTOM2402>, correct? I'm glad that more could join on this quest.
I am off for Waterdeep. Excuse me.
My name is Jax. Professor Jax, a famous archeologist don't you know. I am looking for knowledge about some ancient creatures. That's why I came here. Who are you?
Er... trolls of course. Like the ones that attacked my expedition.
Actually you kind of talk like them though.
Trolls attacked a group of us in a cave to the north. We were there searching for an entrance to... ah but maybe I should start with an introduction.
I am talking about a creator race. Very fascinating actually. I believe they lived thousands of years ago and I think one of their ruins lies somewhere around here.
Oh, a fellow scholar are you? Let me tell you about my research.
Oh, I'm not actually hunting them, dear <boy/girl>. They are already dead.
Oh... oh my, that hardly seems to be a polite way to start a conversation. Are you sure you're not a troll? I suppose not.
No, no, no, I am looking for proof of the existence of this race.
You see, some fellow archeologists and I were hunting through the cave systems in the area to find an entrance to some ruins that lie beneath them. It was a marvelous expedition, or so it seemed.
I was studying a rock formation in one of the caves when they attacked us. We had some guards with us and they were holding the ogres off, but the trolls killed them as easily as children.
Not too much is known about them. They were very powerful and it is speculated that they fought for control of Toril against the dragons.
If they were as advanced as I think they were then they should have left behind some writings.
If I could get my hands on a book that proves these ruins were built by the creator race, then I could get the rest of my grant money. I need to find a Complete History of the Ruins.
You know what I'm looking for! We already talked about this. All right, I'll go over the important parts again.
Oh my. I was really hoping you could help. If you change your mind come talk to me again.

Oh my <lord/lady>, that would be wonderful. And since I need this for my own financial gain, I would pay you 500 gold pieces and you can keep any treasure you find. Here is a key for the barracks. You can talk to my colleagues inside for more information.
Hmm. Well I guess I do need the help. I could pay you 500 gold pieces if you bring it to me. Here is a key for the barracks. You can talk to my colleagues inside for more information.

I suppose I don't have much choice, since no one else will go do it. I can pay you 500 gold pieces if you find it for me. Here is a key for the barracks. You can talk to my colleagues inside for more information.
Just find me a tome that proves the creator race existed and that they built these ruins. Bring it back to me as quickly as you can.
Oh. That's too bad. If you change your mind, just speak to me again.

Er... well, if they were powerful enough to contend with dragons, as I think they were, then they must have had some powerful magic items. Not to mention wealth. The trolls might have some treasure too.
Oh dear, your memory is shorter than mine! As I said before, I am looking for an ancient tome I need. So far I have had little luck.
Er... yes, well, goodbye again.
Er... um... oh, yes! Astounding! How did you get past the trolls? No, it is of no import. What matters is you have it now.
Well, excellent job young <lad/lass>. So... I trust 500 gold pieces is ample reward for recovering this book?
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh my. Well, I guess it was probably very tough. I hope that 750 gold will cover it. That's all I have left.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> 500 gold pieces is all I can afford right now. You wouldn't break an agreement, would you?
Er... good. I must return to Waterdeep now. Good luck to you.
Wait! Please, my <lord/lady>! 1000 gp, no more!
Part of me wishes the trolls got you. Oh my, I can't believe I said that. I've got to get back to civilization.
Oh... er... why did you even come back here then, if you were going to keep it?
No one will pay you more than I would have, because no one wants it as badly. What a mistake! Fine, goodbye.
Oh my, you must have had a rough time. No need to get jumpy. Here is 750 gp. It's all that I have left.
Wonderful. I can hardly wait to get back to Waterdeep. Those snobs are going to choke when they see this! Good luck <lad/lass>.
No! It is of no value to you, but I simply must have it. Please!
I think there are ruins underneath the cave systems in this area. The book should be in there somewhere.
Good luck in the search young <lad/lass>.
Er... um... well I guess there's not much else to say. Keep hunting.
I paid an advance already, dear <man/woman>. I expect a get-to-it attitude for that kind of money. Is there anything else?
Oh, I don't think you understand how important this is. This could really help our understanding of the historical roots of society.
Um... so... have you any news? Any clues to the tome's whereabouts yet?
We ran for our lives. The guards gave us enough time for a few of us to get away. But not enough. Not nearly enough.
We hired what we could afford. And we paid for our mistake.
I figured there should be lots of treasure and tomes created by this race. But then we were attacked by the trolls and ogres.
All that death has come to nothing! So many sacrifices and we still don't have the proof I need about the creator race.
You sound like the supposed 'scholars' in Waterdeep. Always sneering in disbelief.
This happened over 10,000 years ago. Even before the first human civilization of the Netheril came into power.
They used powerful spells, creating magical effects and items that can only be dreamed of now that the gods have limited its use.
No, no, no! The money is necessary to keep funding my research.
The money goes to pay for guards, supplies and equipment, as well as the expertise of other researchers. Without that money, I cannot learn more.
That is why it is so important that I find this proof.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> That seems reasonable. Here is 100 gp. That should seal the deal.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I just can't afford to do that. I can only pay you when you bring the artfiact back.
Be careful <lad/lass>. This has turned out to be a very difficult operation. Good luck.
Oh, hello there again. Er... something you needed? I am quite busy with my research, you know.
Oh. I wouldn't expect someone of your limited... uh... that is, it's always pleasant to see someone interested in my research! Let me tell you about it.
Who are you?
I want to ask you some questions.
Who you be?
Me have questions.
Goodbye.
My name is <FirstName>.
My name is <FullName>. I'm pleased to meet you.
You don't need to know my name.
I don't usually share my name with cretins.
Me name be <FirstName>.
Me be called <FullName>. Nice meet you.
You not need know name.
You grumpy. Me not tell.
What's put you in this mood?
You're certainly miserable.
Why you in such bad mood?
Why you got stick up butt?
You don't think the ruins exist?
You no think there be ruins?
You're miserable. I'm done talking to you.
You too grumpy. Me no talk no more.
Nothing?
I have no idea.
Me not know.
Oh, I'm sorry. That's horrible.
Guess you should have been paying better attention.
Me sorry. That bad to happen to you brother.
Ha! That be funny to see.
What would you be willing to pay to have these trolls and ogres wiped out?
That sounds like an important job. I'll do it.
What's your name?
Why are you in such a bad mood?
What you name?
What happen 'round here?
What's going on around here?
Why you bad mood?
What exactly can't you stand?
What you no stand?
What you pay me kill trolls 'n' ogres?
Me like kill trolls. Me do job.
I'm not interested. Goodbye.
Me no want that job. Bye bye.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I think it would be a sign of good faith if you fronted me some of that gold.
All right, I'm off.
Me want some gold now, else me make you troll-bait.
You better give me some of that gold right now, or else I'll take you with me for bait.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me think me should have some gold now, please?
Me go kill trolls now.
What do you want done again?
I have the troll's head right here.
I've changed my mind, I'll hunt the trolls for you.
No. I'm still not interested.
What you want again?
I have big ugly's head here.
Me want hunt trolls now.
Me not want job still.
The whole thing.
A summary.
I need no reward. Avenging a life and slaying evil is reward enough.
As we agreed, that will be fine.
You had better find some more, or I'll make you look like this troll.
No pay. I glad I avenge brother and kill trolls.
That be good.
You pay more, or me cut your head off too.
What was I supposed to do again?
I'm working on it.
What me do again?
Me trying. Just wait.
Sure.
No thanks.
What do you want? Ah, my apologies <sir/madam>. I'm in a foul temper today. How can I help you?
What do you want? Sorry, I'm in a foul temper today. How can I help you?
What do you want? I've had enough trouble and I'm in a foul temper today. How can I help you?
I see you are back again. Have you changed your mind about killing those trolls?
So you're back. Do you have the head of the troll chieftain yet?
Well, I'll be off now. Farewell.
My name is Lenton. Now what's your name?
Fine. So like I said, what do you want?
All right, I'm sorry. It's just that a plague of locusts couldn't make things worse.
Well, aren't we in just a dandy cheerful mood today!
Oh, just too special to share, huh?
How about we start with creator-race-obsessed Jax and his stupid expedition to find ruins that don't exist.
Maybe before you judge people, you ought to find out if they have a reason for being upset.
Fine. That actually improves my day!
Oh, I did. Jax had me totally convinced. But we searched through cavern after cavern. And you know what we found?
Blast! I wish we had found nothing.
We found trolls! And ogres! Hordes of trolls and their pet ogres. No ancient creatures, no tombs, no tomes, just trolls and ogres.
We were studying this unusual rock formation, because Jax thought it might be special. But it wasn't. Suddenly I hear this scream.
I turned around and there's this huge troll holding my brother, Drokas, by one leg. It dangles him upside down and then... it bites his head off.
You're exactly the kind of person I need to help me get revenge.
I don't need your pity! I need your help.

The one that... ate my brother was obviously the leader. He started pointing and snarling and a whole tribe, or whatever you're supposed to call a group of trolls, rushed out and started to attack us.
Only a few of us escaped from those caves. I want someone to go back there and wipe out every one of those trolls. Especially the big one.
I guess I'll try. Don't waste my time though.
Nothing! We're all just standing around doing nothing. I can't stand it anymore.
Ya, bye.
Excellent. Bring me the troll Chieftain's head and I will pay you 300 gold.
All I can afford to pay you is 300 gold. That's all I have left after this fool's errand. So what do you think?
Like I should be surprised. If you decide to develop a backbone, just come back here.
Okay. Good luck and happy hunting.
That's an excellent attitude for a hunter. All right, here's 100 gold.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Okay. I guess I could pay you 100 gold. But I expect results!
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I can't do that. You bring me a head, I give you the gold. That's the only deal you are getting.
Oh for pity's sake. All right, do you need the whole story again, or just a summary?
I want you to go down into the caves and kill all of the trolls. Then bring me back the big guy's head.
So, are you up for the job?
Then why are you bothering me? Don't talk to me unless you want to hunt some trolls.
Finally! My brother is avenged. I am very impressed with your skill.
I will take that off your hands and burn it with pleasure. I wish I had more gold to pay you, but 300 is all I have. Sorry there isn't more.
You are an honorable <man/woman>. I shall tell everyone I know of your heroic deeds.
Very well. Good luck to you in the future. I am off.
I guess I should have expected such a comment from your type. You can threaten all you want. You won't find anymore money on my corpse.
Here is your 300 gold, just as I promised. Now, I am off.
Oh, for pity's sake! I want you to go down into the caves and kill the trolls. Bring back the big troll's head.
Now, get going and finish the job.
All right, well keep trying. I'll be waiting.
I don't understand what you are saying.
Yes, I can understand you.
That doesn't sound like the proper tone of voice for one who was beaten, but I understand what you say.
Me know what you say. What you be?
Me not like way you talk. You watch mouth or me take you head.
Me not know what you say.
I don't know what you are talking about. We "mammals" rule the world.
You talk as if you just won the battle. Why aren't you afraid of me?
What you mean? We rule world.
Me just beat you. Why you no afraid of me?
Slaves? We are nobody's slaves.
I'm not answering any of your questions until you answer mine.
Slaves? Me no be slave to anyone.
Me not answer questions 'til you answer mine.
They don't really rule much of anything. Are you concerned about dragons?
If you don't answer my questions right now, I'm going to slit your slimy throat!
I'm not talking to you anymore. Get out of my sight.
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Dragons? Does your race fear the power of the dragons?
What are you?
Who are you?
Not rule, but do fly. You worry 'bout dragons?
You answer me questions now, or me cut heads off.
You bothering me. Go away quick.
I can tell you that I am getting rather tired of being called a mammal. Call me <FirstName>.
What are you doing here?
What you be?
Who you be?
What you do here?
That doesn't answer my question.
I don't trust you. I think I had better kill you.
That not good answer! No make any sense.
Me no trust you. Me kill you now.
You say we. Who are you refering to?
What makes you think your race will dominate ours?
Me just beat you. What make you think you take us over?
You will answer my questions now!
You answer me questions now, or else!
I have more questions.
Me have more question.
I have more questions.
Me have another question.
Who is this queen you speak of?
Who be you queen?
I would ask you more questions.
Me want ask more question.
If you are so powerful, then how was I able to defeat you?
If you so tough, why me beat you so easy?
Essa sythider cansticyle, vassa! Vassa! Vassa!
Fregan paeca, fregan paeca. Sussenda messa!
Syssin weras goola sisni?
Posna! Eck canessa tallak!
There! That brood spell should enable us to converse. Can you understand me, mammal?
Why are you in here? How does a soft, weak mammal like yourself dare to enter this room?
Such a thing cannot be. How could your slave race have risen so high?
I... I am unused to being in a subordinate position. It is hard for me to get used to. How is it that a slave race could become this powerful?
We might no longer be in power, or so you say, but then surely the draconic race must rule the surface as they used to rule the skies?
All right, mammal. I suppose I should humor your request, since I did surrender. What questions would you ask of me?
As if I would turn tail and flee from a mammal like you. You have given me enough time to recover.
Hm. You mammals have become more intelligent than we had suspected. Interesting.

My, a sense of identity. You are much like the Sentiegans. It didn't take long for their resistance to be broken. It should be amusing to see what becomes of your civilized manners when our race dominates yours again.
I am a member of a race that is highly superior to yours. We are masters of flesh, mind and spirit.
You have given me enough time to recover.

I remember being in a dark, peaceful sleep. I thought it would never end, but my companions and I awoke when we heard a call from our Queen. May her all-knowing, all-powerful wisdom guide us to our glorious destiny.
Someday soon your race will once again fall under our domination.
So the winged masters have been weakened? Excellent. Do you mean to tell me that you mammals aren't ruled by a greater race?
It would, if your race had true intelligence, but I will speak so that one such as you can understand. We are the master race, created perfect in form and mind, and meant to rule the lesser races.
My name is Synsilliusarian, though I doubt your fleshy tongue could possibly pronounce such a noble name. I am a mage of the Calantian Order.
Though it will mean nothing to you now, once we have dominated your race again you will learn how great of an honor it is to have spoken with me.
You haven't even the slightest idea of what you face. You will learn, in time. Is your mind completely worn out from the effort of communicating, or do you have other questions?
(Sigh) That such a small, barbaric mind could defeat us. This is a sad day.
This is very hard to understand. Things have obviously changed greatly.
Now you die!
Now it is you who shall die!
She is the Tykalatian Matriarch. She is power beyond understanding. Cunning beyond belief. You will fall to her, as all have fallen before. That is all I will tell you.

I remember being in a dark, peaceful sleep. I thought it would never end, but my companions and I awoke when we heard a call from our Queen. May her all-knowing, all-powerful wisdom guide us to our glorious destiny.
Her words whispered in my mind, communicating visions of conquest and power. The entire world would bow before us, begging for mercy and receiving none.
Since awakening we have not heard from her again, but when she speaks we will go forth and conquer.
We possess incredible magics, the likes of which your puny mages can only dream of. Our warriors are fearless and nearly unstoppable.
I have not been awake long. Perhaps I have simply not recovered my full strength. Be assured, when my queen decides that it is time, we shall come forth and show you what real power is.
Sounds bad. What's your name?
There, there, fellow. It'll be all right. May I ask you some questions?
Don't you think you're a little old to be crying like that? What's your name?
Uh, don't worry, maybe I can help. Why don't you answer some questions for me first?
Oh quit your blubbering and tell me who you are.
Yeah, whatever. I have a question.
You so sad. Who you?
Me have questions.
Goodbye.
Call me <FirstName>.
My name is <FullName>. Pleased to meet you, Revat.
I'm not sure I want to tell you my name right now.
Me is <FirstName>.
Me called <FullName>. Is nice to meet you.
Me not want tell.
What's so terrible about today?
What bad about today?
Why don't you start by telling me who you are?
Who you?
Don't you think the trolls would have eaten your mom?
Where would they be keeping your mom?
What would you pay to get your mom back?
Don't worry, I'll save her for you.
I wish I could help, but I'm busy right now.
You Momma be eaten maybe?
You know where she being held?
You pay for rescue maybe?
Me help you. Me save the mom.
Nope. Me too busy.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> All right, but I think I might need some money now, to help me rescue your mom.
Fine. But you better pay me some up front, or maybe Momma won't come back ever!
I'll do what I can.
Momma will be returned safe and sound, I promise.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me need some coin now to help save Momma.
Me want coin now. You give gold or Momma not get back maybe!
Me do that.
You Momma come back safe soon. Me promise!

I will keep looking for her.
I'm so sorry my good man, but your Momma died while I was trying to save her from the trolls.
I did, but she was killed. Them's the breaks.
Not yet, but I'm working on it.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get around to it eventually.
Say where she is again? Me forget.
Me keep looking for you Momma.
Me so sorry... but she die when me freeing her...
Me free her, but she die on way. (belch!) Oh well.
No, but me working on it.
Me get around to it sometime, maybe.
Tell me where she can be found.
You tell me where she be.
Not yet, but I'm working on it.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get around to it eventually.
No, but me working on it.
Me get around to it sometime, maybe.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Do you think your Momma is only worth 300 gp?

Thank you. That will be fine.
No, there's no need for the reward. I was happy to do it.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me thinks you could try. You love you Momma, right?

This is okay.
No, me no need reward. Me happy to help.
Sorry, you've made a mistake. I'm not with <CUSTOM2401>.
Yes, I'm with <CUSTOM2401>.
Me not with <CUSTOM2401>.

Me could help, if you say what me need do.
Why? What went wrong?
Like that should surprise me?
What go wrong?
You screw up badder than me.
The trolls that Jax told me about.
And so like a great warrior, you ran away.
Trolls be nasty.
So like coward, you run away?
I have decided I will save your mother.

Me decide me save the Momma.

Momma? Oh, you not Momma. Oh me in big trouble.
Ya, bye bye. Everybody go bye bye.
Ya, you go bye bye too.
Ya, bye.
Me name be Revat. Who you be?
You cry too if you have such bad day. Me name be Revat. Who you be?
You be mean. Me not like that. Me Revat, and who you be rude <man/woman>?
I glad meet you <FirstName>. Me wish could be on happy day.
That nice. How me help you on bad day like today.
Me glad meet you, <FullName>. (sigh) Wish it not be such bad day to meet friend.
Thank you. What you want of me on such bad day.
It too bad day for me to care. What you want?
You be stupid if you play game on bad day. Me not talk to you.
Me try, but me not in good mood to talk. Me having very bad day.
Me try, but me having bad day. Me not good mood for talk.
You not very nice. What you want?
Me Momma be stole by trolls. Me need get her back or me be in big trouble.
Me like way you talk.
No! You no say trolls eat Momma! Momma no be eaten or me lost! You find Momma.
She be in cave in area. Same place you go for to help Jax. Me see you got key.
Me pay you 300 gold. Me not have much else. That be all Momma give.
Oh no! Now me never see Momma again!
Me wish you could help. Me will never be same without Momma. Bye.
You go 'way if you no help. Me too sad to talk anymore.
Oh, you good <man/woman>. You find me Momma. Me tell you what me know.

They have me Momma in cave near here. She be nice and sweet, 'cept when she grab ears and yell at you for plate breaking, or milk spilling, or peas not eating, or fidgeting, or... but me not s'posed to talk 'bout her like that.

Here... I give you ring to show Momma. This me daddy's ring from when he die. Me not know him, but me Momma say he be nice quiet man. Me friend say he nagged to death, but me not understand what that mean.
Go quick and help Momma be safe.
Hello, <CUSTOM2401>. Have you found Momma? Me in so much trouble.

Thank you! Me hope to see Momma 'gain soon.
Go quick and save Momma. Me wait for you here.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Okay. Me do anything to help get Momma back.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> No. Me momma no let me give out gold. You get Momma, then she say it okay.
Oh no! You not hurt Momma! I give you 100 gold. Now you go save Momma.
Please find Momma quick. Me miss her lots.
No 'ventually. You go now and save Momma quick.
Where me daddy's ring go? You need show Momma ring so she trust you.
I glad you have ring. You go quick now and show Momma so she come back.
She be in cave with trolls 'n ogres near here. Me not know more.
Bring me Momma here quick, then me pay you.
Noooooooooooooooooooooooo! Momma no die! Momma no die!
You lie! Me go find Momma. She no be dead.
Noooooooooooooooooo! Momma no die. You never try to find her.
I see <CUSTOM2401> gave you Momma's ring. That mean job be yours, now? You find Momma soon?
I glad you join to help find Momma.
She be stole by trolls in cave near here.
Please find me Momma soon. Me miss her lots.
No. Must find Momma quick. Not later, now!
Ho wow! Me so happy you find Momma! She pull me ear when she get back; me love her so.
Here. Momma say me give you 300 gold like me promised.
Oh dear, me forget lots. Sorry. Here is 375 gp. That be everything I have in whole world. Now me no can buy pet.
Okay, Momma say me have to go now. Bye bye.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh, you right. Momma worth 375 gp, 'cause that all I have.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Me sorry. Momma not let me have more. That all me have.
Momma says we go now. Bye bye.
Me wish me could give more. Thank you much. Me glad have Momma back. Hello Momma, me coming!
Momma say me must go now. Bye bye.
Oh, you be best friend in whole world <lord/lady>. I hope you come see me when you come to Waterdeep.
Momma say we must go. Bye bye.
No one else here help me and me 'fraid go back in dark cave. Me must wait here, hope she come back.
I sorry. I thought maybe you join to help <CUSTOM2401>.
Okay. Me told <CUSTOM2401> already.
<CUSTOM2401> already say help me.
But if you find Momma then me pay you. I only want Momma back.
Me not able talk more. You go find Momma.
Hey, you find Momma yet? Me in so much trouble. Me must get Momma safe.
No sometime! You go find her now. Me need her.
Momma be good arkeyolojist, you know digs-for-old-stuff person. Me be her helper. Me protects her. Only me not do so good job.
Me talking with other guard when look back, Momma gone. Me not worry much. She go sometimes, then she come back.
Me suppose me deserve that. Still not nice.
Then we hear sounds, like mad dogs. We turn round and there be trolls 'n ogres.
Yes. Nasty trolls. Ugly ogres. So we get ready and start to fight. Monsters kill most of guards, but me fight brave. Then troll hit me in head and cut me.
Not what happen! You wait for story. I tell you 'bout trolls.
I no longer can see with blood in eyes. Then Jax grab me hand and lead me out of caves. Me lucky to survive.
Oh, you be back. What you want?
Bye.
Here lies the brave and noble frontiersman Alloch, who scoffed at the warnings of lesser men and built this fine tower.
Calm down. I'm not going to eat you.
Me no eat you. Me not eat people.
No. I am not a troll.
Do I look like a troll?
No, me not troll.
Do me look like troll?
There aren't any screams. You don't have to worry, I'm killing the trolls.
Wonderful. What am I supposed to do with a madman?
There no be screams. No worry, me kill trolls.
Oh great. Now what me do with crazy person?
I've already killed a number of trolls. Now, what's your name?
I can handle trolls. What is wrong with you? Have you lost your mind?
Me kill lots of trolls. Tell me what name you have.
Me can take trolls. Why you so crazy?
I guess you have an excuse. Don't worry, I have already killed a number of trolls.
I don't have time to escort you back to the surface, but the way should be clear.
Do you want me to take you to the surface?
Me no have time to take you up. You go. It be safe now.
You want me take you to surface?
What other thing?
Whatever. Goodbye.
Who's afraid? The trolls?
What is it? Do you know?
Who afraid? Trolls?
What is thing? You know what thing be?
That's horrible. They did it right in front of you?
Enough whining already! I'm getting out of here, with or without you.
Me sorry that happen, but you no worry, me kill lots of trolls.
That awful. You see them eat friends?
You quit crying! Me go now, with you or not, me no care.
Ahh! Don't eat me please!
You... you aren't a troll are you?
Then please help me. I need to get out of here. They're coming to kill me and eat me.
I can hear them. I can hear them coming. Can't you hear them? Can't you hear the screams? They're eating the others.
I don't know. I... I guess not. But they are close.
You? You can't kill the trolls. They killed all the guards, they'll kill you too.
Crazy? Me? Yes, maybe I am. Maybe I have imagined all of this. Maybe the other four are still alive. Perhaps I never saw the trolls come here.
You could be right. The trolls didn't come in and tear the others apart. They didn't rip off limbs and chew the flesh from the bone.
Too many! There are too many. And just when you think you've killed one, it pulls itself back up and starts to attack again. No, we have to flee!
Yes, I will go by myself. Then the trolls will eat you while I escape. The trolls will get you. And if they don't, the other thing will.
No! The trolls will eat you. They will find you. And even if they don't, the other thing will.
They're afraid of it. It's down deep. They won't go near it.
Can you imagine something that could scare trolls? They know it is powerful. There is nothing we can do. It will kill them and then it will kill you.
I must flee now! Good luck.
I will flee now. You will die so that I might live. Thank you.
Then it is real? No. Even Kendin? He's really dead? No. I must get out of here.
What are you saying?
Goodbye.
What you say?
Thurth mog lama gat rag.
Here is the ring.
What is the first seal?
I need to get through the portal.
I am one of the Masters. Let me pass.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> But I have been sent by the masters. I am on an important mission and must have access to the door.
Where can I get such a ring?
What first seal?
Me use portal.
Me Master. Me pass.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me sent by Masters. Me pass.
Where ring?
Qarth suclasa turth?
I am the guardian of the first seal. None may pass.
You may not pass.
You speak like the masters. You may pass.
You may pass.
I am done with you.
It is the portal that stands behind me. Only the masters may pass through.
None may pass.
You do not speak the Masters' tongue. You are one of the slave races. You may not pass.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> You do not possess the creator's ring. Slaves who have been sent by the creators always have the ring of Gax.
I will answer no more questions, slave.
What are you saying?
What you say?
Goodbye.
I must get through the second seal.
Thurth mog lama gat rag.
I am one of the Masters. Let me pass.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> But I have been sent by the Masters. I am on an important mission and must pass.
Where can I find the password?
Must pass second seal.
Me master. Me pass.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me sent by Masters.
Where password?
Qarth suclasa turth?
I am the guardian of the second seal. None may pass. You must speak the password in the Masters' tongue.
None may pass. You must speak the password in the Masters' tongue.
You may not pass, slave. You must speak the password in the Masters' tongue.
You speak the Masters' tongue. You may pass.
I am done with you.
You do not speak the Masters' tongue. You may not pass.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> You do not speak the Masters' password. You may not pass.
I will answer no more questions, slave.
Two seals have been passed. I shall guard the third with my life. Die, intruder!
Impertinent slave!
Vassa intruders! Vassa!
You dare disturb us!
Who are you?
What is this place?
What are you doing here?
Who you be?
What this place be?
What you be doing here?
How do you know that?
Nope. That's not my name.
How you know?
You make mistake. That not be me name.
What kinds of things do you discuss and learn about?
What do you mean 'challenge' nature?
What do you mean, they've gone missing?
Yes, well... nature bores me. Goodbye.
What you talk and learn 'bout?
What you mean 'challenge' nature?
What you mean some missing?
Me get easily bored. We no talk no more. Bye bye.
Thank you.
Too late.
You mean rangers and druids are being attacked?
I guess they finally get to see what everyone experiences in the wild.
You say rangers and druids no be safe no more?
That what it always be like when me camp in woods.
What is wrong with the Spirit?
What is the Spirit of the Wood?
What be spook in trees?
What be wrong with Spirit?
So what is wrong with it then?
I don't understand that at all.
So what be wrong then?
Me not know what you mean.
I think so, but then what is wrong with the Spirit?
No. I still don't understand.
Maybe. So what wrong with Spirit?
Nope. Me not need brain tell hand what to do.
Oh, okay.
I think I can handle that.
What's in it for me if I decide to do this?
I think I'm a little busy right now.
Me do it.
What you pay for me to do this?
Me got other things to do.
What did you mean when you said some of you went missing?
What you mean when you say some folk go missing?
I swear I shall do my best to save the Wood.
Yeah, yeah, enough with the speeches. I said I would take the job.
Maybe you should find someone else. I'm rather busy.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You shall find I am always very committed - to gold.
Me swear me do good job!
Why you keep going on and on and on. Me say me take job.
Me not want job that bad. You get someone else.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me committed to get paid. You pay, me do.
